sourcesContent:
/* eslint-disable jsx-a11y/alt-text */ import React from 'react' import Accordion from '@mui/material/Accordion' import AccordionSummary from '@mui/material/AccordionSummary' import AccordionDetails from '@mui/material/AccordionDetails' import Typography from '@mui/material/Typography' import ExpandMoreIcon from '@mui/icons-material/ExpandMore' import MuqButton from '../UI/MuqButton' import classes from './OrderItem.module.css' const OrderItem = (props) => { let totalMoney = 0 props.item.orders.forEach((orderMoney) => { let forNow = orderMoney.amount * orderMoney.price totalMoney += forNow }) const deleteOrder = () => { console.log(props.item.id + ' silindi') } const orderSucceded = () => { console.log(props.item.id + ' teslim edildi') } return ( <> } aria-controls="panel1a-content" id="panel1a-header" > Siparis Numarasi: {props.item.id}
Siparis Veren: {props.item.orderOwner}
{props.item.orders.map((meal) => { return (
{meal.name} Adet: {meal.amount} ${meal.price}
) })}
Total: ${totalMoney}
) } export default OrderItem
